contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be translated in active form. Alternate translation: "Before you laid the first stones for the temple" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-activepassive]])
contextId.glQuote: Before stone was placed upon stone in the temple

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be translated in active form. Alternate translation: "the day that you laid the foundation of Yahweh's temple" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-activepassive]])
contextId.glQuote: the day that the foundation of Yahweh's temple was laid
